name: METAR Extractor
description: This reads the first 5 elements from a METAR.  Works with AFMAN15-111 Chapter 14.Short explaination:group 1:METAR or SPECIgroup 2:Contains the ICAO Airport Code.group 3:Day of Month.group 4:Hours. ZULU!group 5:Minutes. "group 6:Matches if Corrective METAR (date/time is same of erroneous METAR)group 7:Wind angle, VRB is for variable angle if speed < 6KT.group 8:Wind speed.group 9:Gust speed if given.group 10:Units used for speed.group 11:Matches the min variable angle if speed > 6KT.group 12:Matches the max variable angle if speed > 6KT.group 13:Matches the whole number when Statute Miles.group 14:Matches fraction values of M1/4, 1/4, 1/2, and 3/4 when Statute Miles.group 15:If unit is given, Statute Miles is the unit as per AFMAN15-111.group 16:If prevailing visability is in meters, no unit is given.group 17:Everything between RMK and the above will be parsed later.group 18:Matches if REMARK.group 19:The REMARK.group 20:Used if no remark.
author: Eric Roth
